PF1.Title: Pathfinder 1
SETTINGS.pf1DiagL: Configure which diagonal movement rule should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.pf1InitTiebreakerH: Append total initiative divided by 100 to break ties in Initiative.
SETTINGS.pf1ExpRateL: The rate at which characters advance in levels
SETTINGS.pf1NoExpL: Remove experience bars from character sheets.
SETTINGS.pf1OpenXPDistributorL: Opens the XP distributor on combat end unless Shift is held when the combat's deletion is confirmed
SETTINGS.pf1BackgroundSkillsH: Use the Background Skills optional ruleset
SETTINGS.pf1FractionalBaseBonusesH: Use the Fractional Base Bonuses optional ruleset
SETTINGS.pf1PCWoundsAndVigorH: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for player characters.
SETTINGS.pf1NPCWoundsAndVigorH: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for nonplayer characters.
SETTINGS.pf1AutoCollapseCardL: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log
SETTINGS.pf1MeasureStyleL: Whether to use Pathfinder's measurement style instead of FoundryVTT's default style
SETTINGS.pf1LowLightVisionModeH: When checked, players who have no token selected will not benefit from any of their tokens' low-light vision (this also applies to darkvision)
SETTINGS.pf1CoinWeightH: How many coins weigh 1 lbs. Set to zero (0) to disable coin weight.
SETTINGS.pf1SpellPointCostH: Default cost spellpoint using spells use if not configured per spell.
SETTINGS.pf1SharedVisionModeH: How to handle Shared Vision between players.
SETTINGS.pf1characterVisionH: Player Characters by default have token vision, regardless of default token setup.
SETTINGS.pf1AllowScriptChangesH: Allows the use of "Script"-type changes in the world
SETTINGS.pf1AllowScriptChangesW:
This settings would allow players to execute arbitrary code as the GM.

Are you absolutely sure you want to enable this?
SETTINGS.pf1AllowScriptChangesD: Script Changes have been deprecated. Replace them and disable their setting to remove this warning.
SETTINGS.pf1AllowScriptChangesF: A Change of the deprecated type "Script" has been found on {parent}. Please use another operator. Details have been logged to the console.
SETTINGS.pf1HideTokenConditionsH: Whether buffs should hide their icons from token status effects
SETTINGS.pf1obscureInlineRollsH: Hide inline rolls from those without at least observer permission.
SETTINGS.pf1obscureSaveDCsH: Hide DC values from chat cards from players.
SETTINGS.pf1CoreEffectsH: Displays only PF1 conditions on tokens (unchecked) or core icons as well (checked)
SETTINGS.pf1HideChatButtonsH: Whether to hide chat card buttons, such as those found on attack rolls.
SETTINGS.pf1AttackChatCardTemplateH: Select the style of attack type chat cards
SETTINGS.pf1UnchainedActionEconomyH: Whether to use the Unchained Action Economy optional ruleset.
SETTINGS.pf1SkipActionDialogsH: Skips action prompts (such as those from attacks and saving throws) unless you Shift-click them
SETTINGS.placeMeasureTemplateOnQuickRoll: Enables the placement of measure templates when skipping the action prompt.
SETTINGS.pf1InvertSectionFilterBehaviour: Inverts shift-click behaviour on type filters in (item) sections.
SETTINGS.pf1HideReachMeasurementsH: Don't show reach measurements, such as those found when hovering over token quick actions.
SETTINGS.pf1DisplayIterativesH: Breaks down BAB display to iteratives instead of only the total bonus
SETTINGS.pf1AlternativeReachCornerRuleH: Hides the outer corners from 10-ft reach measurements
SETTINGS.pf1NPCProficienciesH: NPC actors also use proficiencies. With this disabled (default), they are considered proficienct with everything they have as per RAW.
SETTINGS.pf1DisableAttackCardTargetsH: Disables targeted actors from showing up on attack cards
SETTINGS.pf1ClearTargetsAfterAttackH: Whether to untarget everything after an attack roll.
SETTINGS.pf1HealthConfigInstructions: Configure the health computation parameters for the various types of actors.  For reference, Pathfinder Society uses the following configuration for player characters: automatic computation, 0.5 rate, one hitdie maximized, round up, discrete continuity.
SETTINGS.pf1HealthRoundingHint: Health values must be whole numbers.  Round up, nearest, or down?
SETTINGS.pf1HealthContinuityHint: Health can be computed discretely or continuously.  Discrete health is rounded at each level, meaning creatures will receive a stable amount of health for each hitdie.  Continuous health is rounded after each source of hitdie is evaluated, meaning creatures will receive a fluctuating amount of health for each hitdie.
SETTINGS.pf1HealthConfigWoundsAndVigorPC: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for player characters.
SETTINGS.pf1HealthConfigWoundsAndVigorNP: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for nonplayer characters.
SETTINGS.pf1HealthConfigWoundsThresholds: Use wound threshold optional ruleset for player characters.
Use wound threshold optional rulset for nonplayer characters.
SETTINGS.pf1HealthConfigWoundThresholdsP: Allow wound threshold override for PCs
Allows per character override modification of wound threshold rule for player characters in character settings.
SETTINGS.pf1HealthConfigWoundThresholdsN: Allow wound threshold override for NPCs
Allows per character override modification of wound threshold rule for nonplayer characters in character settings.
SETTINGS.pf1DragRulerUseElevationName: Use elevation to determine movement type
SETTINGS.pf1DragRulerUseElevationHint: Use a token's elevation to determine whether it is flying or burrowing

HideTokenTooltip.Name: Hide Token Tooltip
HideTokenTooltip.Hint: Hide token tooltips while this key is held

ForceShowItem.Name: Force Show Item
ForceShowItem.Hint: Whether to show the item to chat when using a macro for it

SETTINGS.pf1UnitsL: System of units to be used in the world
SETTINGS.pf1DistanceUnitsL: Override system of units to be used with distances.
SETTINGS.pf1WeightUnitsL: Override system of units to be used with weights.
PF1.AccessibilityFontSizeHint: Changes font size in certain aspects of the game (such as on attack chat cards)
PF1.TooltipWorldConfigHint: Change tooltip settings for all users
PF1.TooltipWorldConfigHideHeld_Hint: Hide Held items from all players
PF1.TooltipWorldConfigHideActorNameByDis: Hide name from all players when token disposition is worse than configured.
PF1.TooltipWorldConfigNameMinimumPermiss: Minimum ownership level needed to see real token name.

Roll.Desc: Your hit points for this level will be rolled for based on the size of your hit die.

Manual.Desc: You will decide how many hit points you gain for this level.

HP.Desc: You will gain a single hit point as your favoured class bonus for this level.

Skill.Desc: You will gain a single skill rank to freely spend as your favoured class bonus for this level.

Alt.Desc: You will gain something specific for your class and race combination as your favoured class bonus for this level.

Item.Name: Added Ability Scores
Item.Desc: This feature is used for tracking your ability score changes from gaining hit die.

Extra.NewFeat: You have 1 new feat to choose
Extra.NewFeats: You have {newValue} new feats to choose
Extra.NewAbilityScore: You can increase an ability score by +1

PF1.FlagsInstructions: Configure character features and traits which fine-tune behaviors of the PF1 system.
PF1.PointBuyCalculatorSetupHint: Point buy calculator is available here only temporarily. You can always access it from the settings tab.
PF1.PointBuyCalculatorWarning: The point buy calculator will OVERRIDE the character's base ability scores.
PF1.DeleteItemConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
PF1.DeleteSkillConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this skill?
PF1.LinkHelpChildren: Linked children are deleted from the actor when the link parent (this item) is deleted.
PF1.LinkHelpCharges: Linked items inherit and share the charges from the link parent (this item).
PF1.LinkHelpClassAssociations: Class association linked items are automatically added to the actor at the appropriate class level. Unlike other item links, these must be linked from a compendium.
PF1.LinkHelpAmmunition: Linked items automatically lose quantity (or charge) for every attack made with link parent (this item).
PF1.HelpSellMultiplier: The rate at which non-trade goods sell. Trade goods always sell at full price. Default is 0.5.
PF1.HelpDomainSpell: This spell will not cost any spell slots to restore upon rest.
PF1.CurrencyGMRequired: A GM is required to finish the transfer.
PF1.ItemContainerTotalItemValue: Total Item Value: {gp} GP, {sp} SP, {cp} CP

PF1.AutoSpellClassLevelOffset.InfoBox: If you have a prestige class that alters your class level, add that here (e.g. @classes.mysticTheurge.level)

PF1.SpellScoreTooLow: Your ability score is too low to cast spells of this level
PF1.FilterBooleanOperatorHint: Switch between requiring an item to match all filters, or any single one.
PF1.ErrorGenericPermission: You don't have permission to perform that action
PF1.ErrorNoActorPermission: You don't have permission to control this actor
PF1.ErrorNoActorPermissionAlt: You don't have permission to control actor '{name}'
PF1.ErrorNoFormula: {name} does not have a formula to roll!
PF1.ErrorItemFormula: There's a formula error in item "{item}" on actor "{actor}"
PF1.ErrorActionFormula: There's a formula error in action "{action}" in item "{item}" on actor "{actor}"
PF1.ErrorNoQuantity: You don't have any more of that item
PF1.ErrorNoSpellsLeft: You don't have spells left of that type
PF1.ErrorUnauthorizedAction: You are not authorized to perform that action
PF1.ErrorActorFormula: Formula error of type {context} on actor {name}
PF1.ErrorCantIdentify: You are not allowed to identify items
PF1.ErrorNoApplicableActorFoundForAction: No applicable actor found for action '{name}'
PF1.ErrorCouldNotFindActorByName: Could not find actor by name '{name}'
PF1.ErrorNoMacroID: No macro with id '{id}' was found
PF1.WarningNoSizeDie: Could not determine size-appropriate die for {formula}, defaulting to rolling {fallback}
PF1.WarningDuplicateDFlag: Conflicting dictionary flag "{key}" for item "{item}" (with identifier "{tag}") on actor "{actor}".
PF1.WarningDuplicateTag: Duplicate item identifier "{tag}" found in item "{item}" on actor "{actor}".
PF1.WarningNoDiceAllowedInFormula: No dice rolls are allowed in formula '{formula}' for {context}
PF1.WarningInsufficientAmmunition: You have insufficient ammunition of type {type}
PF1.WarningMissingAmmunition: Ammunition linked to the attack is missing.
PF1.WarningConditionalRoll: Rolling conditional formula № {number} of conditional {name} caused an error
PF1.WarningCannotCreateChargeLink: Could not create a Charge type link between {source} and {target}, because {target} has Charge type links of its own
PF1.WarningCannotCreateChargeLink2: Could not create a Charge type link between {source} and {target}, because {target} is already linked to {deeptarget}
PF1.Info_FirstClass:
Drag and drop from {html}
or click the '+ Add' button above.
PF1.Info_MissingClass: Your character is missing a class. Go to the Classes subtab on the Summary tab of your character sheet.

Use.Name: Use
Use.Info: Called when the item has been 'used' (attack, drink potion, etc.). Has the extra variable `attacks`, which is an array containing the action's attack rolls, if any.

Equip.Name: Equip
Equip.Info: Called when the item has been equipped or unequipped. Has the extra variable `equipped`, which is either `true` or `false`.

Toggle.Name: Toggle
Toggle.Info: Called when the item has been enabled or disabled. Has the extra variable `state`, which is either `true` or `false`.

ChangeQuantity.Name: Change Quantity
ChangeQuantity.Info: Called when the quantity of the item has been changed. Has the extra variables `quantity.previous` and `quantity.new`, which are both numbers.

ChangeLevel.Name: Change Level
ChangeLevel.Info: Called when the level of the item has been changed. Has the extra variables `quantity.previous` and `quantity.new`, which are both numbers.

PF1.AbundantDesc: Never remove this ammunition when used.
PF1.UnsavedTinyMCE:
You have unsaved text in a field.
Would you like to save before closing?
PF1.Name: Name
PF1.ToggleSkillLock: Toggle edit lock on rarely needed parts of the skill list.
PF1.SpellsTotalEachDay: Total spells each day (excluding free spells like domain and school spells)

PF1.BaseTypes.Label: Equipment Base Types
PF1.BaseTypes.Description: For abilities that function on specific types, such as Weapon Focus.

PF1.DontShowAgain: Don't show changelog after system updates

PF1.CustomVisionRules.Label: Custom Vision Rules
PF1.CustomVisionRules.Description: Ignore the actor's senses, allowing custom vision rules to be applied properly.

PF1.DomainSlotValueDesc: Number of bonus spell slots Domain/School spells have for each spell level.
PF1.DisableLightLowLightVision: Disable Low-light Vision for Light Source
PF1.CustomRollDesc: This roll uses a non-default formula
PF1.Migration.Start: Applying PF1 System Migration for version {version}. Please stand by.
PF1.Migration.AlreadyInProgress: PF1 System Migration is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before trying again.
PF1.Migration.Ongoing: Migration is ongoing. Please wait until it finishes.
PF1.Migration.End: PF1 System Migration to version {version} succeeded!

TraitSelector.CustomHint: You can separate distinct entries with semicolon (;).

SplitItem.Title: Split item: {name}
SplitItem.Desc: Input the number to split off.

PF1.Info.AddClassDialog: You can hold Shift to bypass this dialog.
PF1.Info.AddClassDialog_Desc: Pressing Normal opens a short wizard, while pressing Raw will add the class without any alterations.
PF1.Info.NotFunctioning: The system (currently) doesn't use this feature

PF1.Troubleshooter.Title: Pathfinder 1e System Troubleshooting
PF1.Troubleshooter.Prelude: Here are some things you may do when facing problems.

Steps.Label: Steps
Steps.Help: Check the {link} (help button near where you opened this dialog).
Steps.Log: Check dev tools console log for errors (F12 [or Option+Command+I on Mac], console tab)
Steps.Modules: Ensure modules are not the cause.
Steps.DisableModules: Launching in safe mode is quick way to disable all modules.
Steps.ModuleSuggest: {link} can alternatively speed up ruling out modules.
Steps.DiscordChannel: {channel} channel is for your Pathfinder 1e needs.
Steps.DiscordHint: The channel pins usually hold any pertinent information.
Steps.Report: Consider {reportlink} as a bug or a feature request.

Actions.Label: Operations
Actions.UnlockPacks: Unlock packs for migration. Locked packs are otherwise ignored.
Actions.MigrateWorldHint:
Normally migration automatically runs, if there are pertinent migrations pending, whenever PF1 update happens and GM logs in the first time.
Running migration manually may sometimes solve problems, such as with documents imported from unmigrated sources.
Actions.MigrateModulesHint: In case you have modules with compendiums that have not been migrated on their end to be fully compatible with current version.

ITEM.TypeClass: Class, Racial HD, Mythic Path, etc.
